entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Peterborough
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:54 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -3.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Peterborough Municipal Airport 05:14 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -3.4°C
Pressure: 99.7 kPa
Visibility: 2.0 km
Humidity: 98 %
Wind Chill: -8
Dewpoint: -3.7°C
Wind: ENE 11 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High zero.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of freezing drizzle late this morning and this afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this morning. Wind becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 near noon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Fog patches developing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 11 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness early in the morning. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Fog patches dissipating early in the morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 1. Wind chill minus 12 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 28 February 2023
